headline: Building AppSec & ASPM Platform
summary: Management and Leadership roles with expertise in team building, strategy, influencing product direction and managing offshore teams. Successful execution of scalable, highly available, secure and high performance applications for real time streaming, big data, data center operations, IoT in SaaS deployments. active_experience_description: OpsMx provides Enterprise Spinnaker, a multi-cloud, and a cloud-native Continuous Delivery Platform. Spinnaker is trusted by over 3000 Enterprises. OpsMx makes Spinnaker Simple, Scalable, Secure, and Safe, and is a trusted Spinnaker partner for several Fortune 500 companies. OpsMx also offers an automated software release verification platform called Autopilot, which accelerates CI/CD pipelines with in-depth release analytics, leveraging machine learning and AI. Autopilot can be used during deployment (canary, blue-green,rolling updates ), testing and build stages or in production. We are a passionate team of over 85 people and have offices in Silicon Valley and India. OpsMx is funded by Top-Tier VCs, Foundation Capital, and Dell Technologies Capital. Follow us on Twitter @Ops_Mx and learn more at www.opsmx.com. Show less

recommendations.recommendation:
“When Jeff applied for a job at ISC, one quick read of his résumé convinced everyone that we had to get this guy on board, even though we did not have an open position!

He is an excellent programmer, smart, and hard working (in spite of his Harvard education).  He quickly became a major contributor to development and was formally recognized for his diligence.

Whoever hires him next is darned lucky and I would hire him myself if I could.”

publications_topics: Julia: A Fast Dynamic Language for Technical Computing

publications.title: Julia: A Fast Dynamic Language for Technical Computing
publications.description: Dynamic languages have become popular for scientific computing. They are generally considered highly productive, but lacking in performance. This paper presents Julia, a new dynamic language for technical computing, designed for performance from the beginning by adapting and extending modern programming language techniques.
